title: Bernie Sanders Clarifies His Stance On Gun Control
text: The Senator from Vermont whoâ€™s running for the Democratic presidential nomination has recently clarified his position on the issue of gun control. Sanders, a self-proclaimed socialist, has historically been to the right of many Democrats when it comes to gun control. His only rival, Hillary Clinton, is much more aggressive when it comes to gun...
